== 1.5 Repeats the code N times ==

This driver uses the form of `(repeat N)`, where N is the number of times to run the body of the macro.

||  || {{{ (++ (repeat 100) (message "Hello, world!")) }}} ||

This example will print the line “Hello, world” 100 times.
